chapter.text: Ai lifu, lia mu, la [alabo yu san ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi]. Zhexie shi jingdian [“gulanjing”] de jing wen, shi mingbai de “gulanjing”[de jing wen].
Bu xinyang zhe yexu hui xiwang ziji yuan shi guishun zhe [musilin].
Ni rang tamen chihe wanle ba! Ni rang tamen bei wangxiang [zhu] mihuo ba! Tamen bujiu jiang zhidao.
Fanshi wo suo huimie de chengshi, ta dou you yige dingqi.
Renhe yige minzu dou bu hui zai qi dingqi qian xiaowang, ye bu hui yanhuan.
Tamen [bu xinyang zhe] shuo:“Shou ci jiaohui [“gulanjing”] de ren [mu sheng] a! Ni zhenshi ge fengzi.
Ni weisheme bu zhaoshi women yixie tianshi ne? Jiaru ni shi chengshi zhe.”
Wo zhi yi zhenli jiang shi tianshi, fouze [ruguo wo jiang shi tianshi], tamen jiang bu bei huanxing.
Wo que yi jiang shi jiaohui [“gulanjing”], wo jiushi jiaohui de baohu zhe.
Zai ni zhiqian, wo que yi paiqian xuduo shizhe qu jiaohua xiri de ge zongpai [zhu].
Mei dang yi wei shizhe lailin tamen, tamen zong shi chaoxiao ta.
Wo ruci shi ta [duo shen chongbai] jinru fanzui zhe de xinzhong.
Tamen bu xiangxin [wo de] jiaohui [“gulanjing”], jinguan qian ren [bu xinyang an la er zao chengfa] de xianli yi shiqu.
Jiaru wo wei tamen cong tianshang kai yidaomen, tamen biding cong na daomen kaishi deng tian,
tamen biding shuo:“Women yanhualiaoluanle, bu, women shi bei mihuo de minzhong.”
Wo que yi zai tiankong chuangzao xuduo gong zuo, bing wei guancha zhe zhuangshi ta.
Wo baohu ta yuanli yiqie bei quzhu de emo de qinfan,
wei qieting de emo liwai,[yinwei] ta you mingxian de huoyan zhuiganzhe.
Wo zhankaile dadi, zai shangmian wengu de anzhi qun shan, bing zai qizhong shengchan chu ge zhong jun liang zhi wu.
Wo zai qizhong wei nimen he nimen buneng gongyang zhe [shengchu yu yeshou deng] chuangzaole xuduo shenghuo ziliao.
Wanwu zai wo zheli dou you zhucun chu, wo zhi yidingliang jiangxia ta.
Wo paiqian feng [gei nong yun] shoujing, ranhou, wo cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, gong nimen yinyong, nimen jue bushi yushui de zhucun zhe.
Wo dique neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si [zhu]. Wo shi wanwu de jicheng zhe.
Wo que zhi nimen yi shiqu de xianbei, ye que zhi nimen de xian bei he houbei.
Ni de zhu bi jiang jihe tamen. Ta que shi zui ruizhi de, quanzhi de [zhu].
Wo que yi yong heise de niantu chuangzao ren.
Yiqian, wo ceng yong huoyan chuangzao jingling.
Dangshi, ni de zhu dui tianshimen shuo:“Wo jiang yong heise de niantu chuangzao yige ren [a dan].
Dang wo zao wan ta bing ba linghun chui ru ta [a dan] de tinei shi, nimen dang fucong ta.”
Suoyou tianshi dou fucongle,
wei yi bu lisi liwai, ta jujue tong tianshimen yiqi fucong.
Ta [an la] shuo:“Yi bu lisi a! Ni weisheme butong tianshimen yiqi fucong ne?”
Ta [yi bu lisi] shuo:“Wo buneng fucong ni yong heise niantu chuangzao de ren.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Ni cong zheli [leyuan] chuqu ba! Ni shi bei quzhu de.
Ni bi jiang chang zao qianze, zhidao shenpan ri.”
Ta [yi bu lisi] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni kuan yan wo dao tamen [renlei] bei fuhuo di na yitian.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Ni bei kuan yanle,
zhidao zhuding de shi ri.”
Ta [yi bu lisi] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Youyu ni rang wo likaile zhengdao, wo bi jiang zai da dishang youhuo tamen [renlei], bi jiang youpian tamen suoyou ren,
tamen zhong ni suo te xuan de puren chuwai.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Zhe shi wo gai weichi de zhengdao.
Ni jue meiyou nengli duifu wo de pu renmen [zhen xinshi], dan zhuisui ni de mi wu zhe liwai.
Huo yu que shi tamen quanti yueding di difang.
Huo yu you qi daomen, mei dao men du jiang shourong tamen zhong pi zhiding de yibufen ren [zhu].
Jingwei zhe bi jiang jin zhu leyuan he quanshui pang.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen pingping'an'an jinru leyuan ba!”
Wo jiang xiaochu tamen [jingwei zhe] xinzhong [bici jian keneng cunzai] de yuanhen, tamen jiang xiongdi ban mianduimian zuo zai bao yi shang.
Tamen zai leyuan li ji bu hui pijuan, ye bu hui bei zhu zou.
Ni dang gaosu wo de pu renmen:“Wo que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
Wo de xingfa que shi tongku de xingfa.”
Ni dang gaosu tamen guanyu yi bu la xin de kerenmen [tianshimen] de gushi.
Dangshi, tamen [tianshimen] jinqu jian ta. Tamen [tianshimen] shuo:“Qiu zhu ci ni ping an!” Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Women feichang haipa nimen.”
Tamen shuo:“Ni buyao haipa, women bi jiang yi yige jingming de nanhai xiang ni baoxi [zhu].”
Ta shuo:“Nimen zai wo nianmai shi hai gei wo baoxi ma? Nimen yao gei wo bao shenme xi ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Women yi zhenli xiang ni baoxi, suoyi, ni buyao juewang.”
Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Chu mi wu zhe wai, shei hui dui ta de zhu [an la] de enhui juewang ne?”
Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Shizhemen [tianshimen] a! Nimen de shiming shi shenme?”
Tamen shuo:“Women fengming lai chengzhi yi huo fanzui de minzhong,
dan lu te de jiaren chuwai, women yi ding ba tamen quanbu jiuchu,
dan ta de qizi liwai.[An la shuo]:“Wo yi zhuding ta [lu te de qizi] tong liu zai houmian de renmen yiqi [bei huimie].”
Dang shizhemen [tianshimen] lai dao lu te de jiali shi,
ta shuo:“Nimen shi yiqun mosheng ren.”
Tamen shuo:“Bu, women gei ni dai laile tamen suo huaiyi de [xingfa],
women gei ni dai laile zhenli [ni de zuren yao bei huimie de xiaoxi], women suo jiang de dou shi shihua.
Ni daizhe ni de jiaren zai wu geng chuzou ba! Ni dang gen zai tamen houmian, nimen zhong renhe ren dou buyao huitou kan. Nimen dao nimen suo bei mingling di difang qu ba!”
Wo rang ta zhidao zhege panjue: Zhexie ren [fanzui zhe] jiang zai zaochen bei genjue.
Cheng li ren xinran lai dao [lu te de jiali].
Ta [lu te] shuo:“Zhexie shi wo de keren, nimen buyao rang wo diulian.
Nimen dang jingwei an la, nimen buyao rang wo shou xiuru.”
Tamen [cheng li ren] shuo:“Nandao women meiyou jinzhi ni tong wairen jiaowang ma?”
Ta [lu te] shuo:“Zhexie shi wo de nu'er [ben zuren zhi nu], jiaru nimen yiding yao zuo.”
Yi ni [mu sheng] de shouming fashi, tamen [bu xiangxin ni de shiming zhe] bi jiang zai tamen de taozui zhong gengjia mangcong.
Kongbu sheng zai fuxiao shi xijile tamen.
Wo shi na zuo chengshi tianfandifu, wo jiangxia shaoguo de taotu ban de shi kuai chengfa tamen.
Dui neng sikao de renmen, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Na zuo chengshi jiu zai [mai jia zhi xuliya de] dalu pang.
Dui xinshimen, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang.
Conglin de jumin [ru an la paiqian shu abu shengren qu jiaohua de ma de ya ren deng] que shi bu yi zhe.
Wo chengfale tamen. Zhe liang ge difang dou zai pingtan de dadao shang.
Shigu de jumin que yi bu xinyang shizhemen [zhu].
Wo ceng ciyu tamen xuduo jixiang, dan tamen zong shi beiqi ta.
Tamen ceng zao shan wei wu, yiwei keyi anju.
Dan kongbu sheng zai fuxiao shi xijile tamen.
Tamen guoqu suo zuo de yiqie dui tamen wuyile.

Wo zhi yi zhenli chuangzao tiandi wanwu. Fuhuo de shijian kending shi yao lailin de, suoyi, ni [mu sheng] dang kuanrong tamen de guocuo [ci jie jing wen zai shengzhan ding wei zhuming qian yi jiang shi].
Ni de zhu que shi chuangzao wanwu zhe, quan zhi zhe.
Wo que yi ci ni chang songdu de qi jie jing wen [zhu][ji “gulanjing” shou zhangfa ti ha] he weida de “gulanjing”.
Dui wo ciyu tamen [bu xinyang zhe] zhong ge zhong ren xiangshou de, ni buyao xianmu, buyao ti tamen youchou. Ni dang qianhe di duidai xinshimen.
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo que shi yi wei tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
Zhengru wo jiang gei fenlie zhe [jidu jiaotu he youtai jiaotu] de yiyang.
Tamen [fenlie zhe] ba “gulanjing” fencheng xuduo bufen [xiangxin yibufen, fouren yibufen].
Yi ni de zhu fashi, wo bi jiang shenwen tamen quanti,
bi jiang shenwen tamen suo zuo de [e xing].
Ni dang gongkai xuanbu ni suo feng dao de mingling, ni dang yuan bi bai ouxiang zhe.
Wo zuyi rang ni duifu chaoxiao zhe.
Tamen [chaoxiao zhe] ji bai an la, you bai qita shenling, tamen bujiu jiang zhidao [chongbai shenling de houguo].
Wo shen zhi ni wei tamen suo shuo de xiongzhong fannao.
Ni [mu sheng] dang zanmei songyang [zhu] ni de zhu [an la], dang tong koutou zhe yiqi koutou.
Ni dang chongbai ni de zhu, zhidao buke bimian de shike [siwang] jianglin ni [zhu].
